g.text: asks to see an overview of all the tests performed and
analyse the overall performance of the company
asks the day or interval of time to analyse
and asks the algorithm to be used
[while the Laboratory Coordinator inserts and selects different data]
inserts and selects the requested data
[Laboratory Coordinator requests analysis for a day]
[Laboratory Coordinator requests analysis for an interval of days]
[The chosen algorithm is the Benchmark algorithm]
[The chosen algorithm is the Brute-force algorithm]
shows an overview of the clients and tests performed, and
shows the overall performance of the company
